page.title: 02Work in Lostock Hall
page.content:
A survey was taken of the people in Lostock Hall to find out where they worked their jobs and how they travelled to work. The sample
was 250. The unemployment rate was 9% of males and 30% of women do not work. One feature of the survey was that over 80% of the people travel outside Lostock Hall to work. The majority of these, 55% to nearby Preston. Those in work have a variety of employments with 40% having factory jobs, 25% in the service area. Less than 10% now work on the land. Apart from travelling to Preston, people work in Wigan, Blackburn and travel as far as Manchester and Liverpool. The most popular mode of transport is the car with over 90% using this method. Less than 2% use local transport.
